HDG.QB.content: when question “What is…?” concerned w/ discussing (erörtern) the surpassing (Überstieg) of beings by Being, this surpassing immediately calls into question elements distinguished from one another in that distinction (Unterscheidung) [beyond ontological difference], the distinction in which doctrine of metaphysics moves, or from which metaphysics receives basic outline (Grundriss) of its language (essence/existence, what-being/that-being)

HDG.QB.content: [Heidegger’s method as Destruction then building (for dwelling)?] build path (Weg) leads back to locality (Ortschaft) of recovery (Verwindung) of metaphysics to let us journey through what is destined in overcoming (Überwindung) nihilism [not there yet, narrative yet to come] > despite rejection of text for publication [annihilation of trace], he who learns must examine more originarily, w/ greater care, the saying of reflective thinking, might leave such saying in realm of mystery one day, as highest gift (höchstes Geschenk) & greatest danger [beyond Being, the worst, totally other, risk annihilation?]

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger speaks of something inappropriate in formulation of “meaning of being,” possible to interpret “project” as a human performance, project only as structure of subjectivity (this is how Sartre reads it) > Heidegger countered this mistake w/ “truth of being,” still retaining meaning of project as opening disclosure (Erschliessung), and to assure that truth wasn’t confused w/ correctness, Heidegger explained it by “location (Ortschaft) of being,” which presupposes understanding of Ortseins des Ortes (place-being of place), hence Topologie des Seyns

HDG.FS.linkedContent: for Heidegger, identity of being/nothing thought in departure (im Ausgang) from ontological difference [departure as from or as leaving behind? cf. 58 departure from Being] > [Hegel thinks this identity w/out concern for ontological difference]

HDG.FS.content: Sein: Nichts: Selbes? > essence of metaphysics: nothing metaphysical [overcoming metaphysics] > Heidegger’s word neither on side of beings, nor simply on that of being: speaks from where horizon of difference (Differenz) becomes visible: ontological difference as condition of possibility (Bedingung der Möglichkeit) for metaphysics [differance] > Heideggerian proposition (Aussage): is difference itself, speaks of difference w/out holding onto it, thus he has abandoned (verlassen) metaphysics

HDG.FS.content: nothing in Heidegger not negative, is a nihilating nothing (nichtendes Nichts), its essence turns away from beings: “nothing in its nihilation refers to the being in its manifestation (Offenbarkeit),” “the nihilation (Nichten) of the nothing “is” being” [cf. 58 nihilating nothing as forgetfulness, beings pressing into foreground?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: nothing in Heidegger not negative, is a nihilating nothing (nichtendes Nichts), its essence turns away from beings: “nothing in its nihilation refers to the being in its manifestation (Offenbarkeit),” “the nihilation (Nichten) of the nothing “is” being” [cf. 58 nihilating nothing as forgetfulness, beings pressing into foreground?]

HDG.FS.content: Heidegger’s question “Why are there beings/not nothing?” doesn’t seek 1st cause [like Leibniz? Schelling?], seeks to come out of forgetfulness of Being > his question authentically says: “how does it come about that you concern yourself so much w/ beings and so little w/ being?”

HDG.FS.content: when attention is drawn to the presencing (das Anwesen) of “letting-be,” this interpretation that of metaphysics [doesn’t Heidegger interpret as such in Anaximander?] > in emphasis (Betonung) on presencing, a 3rd has its place (Ort), the stress (Ton) now on letting itself, that which allows (lässt) (releases [entlässt]?) presencing, allows Being, the epochē of Being: one stands before being as being, not a form (Gestalten) of its destiny [so close to Hegel] > in emphasis to let presencing, no longer room for name Being, letting is pure giving, the it (das Es) that gives, Ereignis [beyond Being]

HDG.FS.content: to unfold question of meaning of Being, Being must be given > Husserl succeeded in this making present of Being, phenomenally present in category > Husserl gave Heidegger ground: “being” no mere concept, no pure abstraction > Husserl doesn’t inquire forth into Being after reaching Being as given, doesn’t ask what it means > no question for Husserl, “being” means being-object (but objectivity is a mode of presence)

HDG.FS.content: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? Marxism & sociology name the “imperatives”—to which we are compelled today > Heidegger gathers then in name Ge-stell, most extreme form of history of metaphysics, of the destiny of being, from epoch of objectivity to orderability, no longer objects only “consumer goods” at disposal of every consumer [w/out objectivity, is there no more consciousness?]
HDG.FS.linkedContent: can man bring about all these imperatives & could he break them himself? HDG.FS.content: surrender consciousness, join new domain (Bereich) of Dasein, must step into it, enter it, to stand in relation to what isn’t man > entry into this domain not produced by thought undertaken by Heidegger: to believe thinking capable of changing place of man, still conceive it (vorstellen) on model of production (Produktion); rather, thinking prepares man for possibility (Möglichkeit) of corresponding to such an entry (Einkehr) [so attention is delayed!]

HDG.FS.content: Marx (like Feuerbach): “criticism of religion ends w/ teaching that man is the highest being for man” > Heidegger’s Marx interpretation not political, concerned w/ Being in manner it destines itself: w/ Marx, position of most extreme nihilism is reached [what about Nietzsche?] > if man is the highest being for man, Being (as Being) is nothing (nichts) (nihil) anymore for man > to understand Marx politically: make politics a mode of self-production (perfectly consistent w/ Marx’s thought) (Marx’s statement decidedly metaphysical)

HDG.DL.content: is the dialogue from out of the nature of language? mustn’t it first enter into a hearing that at once (sogleich) reaches (einzulassen) essence of language? > Heidegger once called this strange relation hermeneutic circle, exists wherever relation of message & message-bearer prevails (waltet) > message-bearer must come from message, but also must have gone toward it [affirm man’s habit, attention to Being, etc.] > but Heidegger will abandon circle, talk of it is always superficial p. 52 reach a corresponding saying of language [rather than speak about hermeneutic circle]

HDG.LP.content: site (Ort), [originally means] die Spitze des Speers (point of the spear) [Derrida repeatedly refers to this statement], gathers into itself, to the highest and most extreme (Äusserste), a gathering that penetrates (durchdringt)/pervades (durchwest) everything > a site gathers & preserves (verwahrt) what it gathers, not like an encapsulated shell (Kapsel), but by shining through, lighting up, and thus releasing (entlässt) what it gathers to its own nature

HDG.LP.content: Geschlecht (kin, kind, generation): a human cast away (verschlagene) from Menschenwesen, stamped (geprägte) in one cast (einem Schlag) > Geschlecht: both mankind as a whole and kinship of race, tribe, family, all of these stamped in the duality of the sexes (Zwiefache der Geschlechter), decomposed form of man, man unsettled (entsetzte) > a curse (Fluch) has struck man [cf. Derrida on Geschlecht, 2nd blow of sexes] > not duality (Zwiefache) but discord (Zwietracht) is the curse

HDG.LP.content: turmoil, curse, [2nd blow], carries each kind (Geschlechter) into irreconcilable split, fragmented stamp, so cleft in 2, can’t find its proper cast (rechter Schlag) [differance not primary for Heidegger here] > the duality of proper cast leaves discord behind, leading into gentleness of simple twofoldness (einfältigen Zwiefalt) [Schelling’s indifference point? sexual difference that isn’t the discord of sexual duality], follows the stranger

HDG.LP.content: via Trakl, apartness is spiritual/ghostly (geistlich), vom Geist bestimmt, but not “of the spirit (geistig)” (in metaphysical sense) > for Trakl, in “Grodek,” spirit is flaming, not pneuma (ethereal), but a flame that inflames, startles (aufjagt), horrifies (entsetzt), shatters us, the glowing lumination > flame is the ek-stasis (Ausser-sich), which lightens and calls forth radiance, but may go on consuming (weiterfressen) and reduce (verzehren) all to white ashes [cf. Derrida on absolute ash] > “Flame is the palest pallor’s brother” > Geist, for Trakl, as gheis (ghost), a being terrified (aufgebracht), beside himself (entsetzt), ek-static

HDG.LP.content: Geist (ghost or spirit), via Trakl, possibility of both gentleness and destructiveness (Zerstörerischen) > Das Sanfte [gentleness] schlägt jenes Außer-sich des Entflammenden keineswegs nieder, sondern hält es in der Ruhe des Freundlichen versammelt [holds ek-stasis in peace of friendship] > Das Zerstörerische [destructiveness] kommt aus dem Zügellosen, das sich im eigenen Aufruhr verzehrt und so das Bösartige betreibt [consumes itself, unbridled evil] > evil is ghostly, the revolt (Aufruhr) of a terror blazing away in blindness, the ungathered, fragmented, unholy—threatens to turn gentleness to ash (des Sanften zu versengen droht) [cf. Derrida on absolute ash]

HDG.LP.content: flaming pain tears away, its rending (Fortriss) consigns [marks?] (einzeichnet) wandering soul to conjunction (Fuge) of storm [heaven]/hunt [God] > would seem pain’s rending would overwhelm (überwältigen), rather than letting soul prevail (walten) in veiling radiance > but! [here is Heidegger’s refusal of differance], the beholding vision (Anschauen) can rejoin (fügt zurück) the flaming sweep (flammenden Fortriss) to the fitting submission (Fügsame) of seeing acceptance (schaunden Hinnehmens) [moral image of thought], der Rückriss im Schmerz, pain achieves its mildness, its power (Walten) to convey/disclose

HDG.WL.content: Heidegger will call the unity of language: Aufriss (design rift), name demands we see proper of language’s essence more clearly > [English translator offers etymology of “sign” in design, Latin signum, secare, to cut] riss like ritzen (carve), to cut a furrow in soil, open to seed/growth > Auf-riss the whole of the traits (Züge) that structures & prevails throughout (durchfügt) the open/freedom of language > Aufriss the drawing/outline (Zeichnung) of language, structure (Gefüge) of a show/indication (Zeigens) in which speakers/speaking, spoken/unspoken, are joined (verfugt)

HDG.WL.content: Sage: showing, pointing out, signaling (Jean Paul called phenomena of nature “spiritual pointer” or “spiritual index finger”) > Das Wesende der Sprach ist die Sage als die Zeige > in view of Gefüge der Sage, showing not exclusively/decisively property of human activity: Das Sichzeigen kennzeichnet als Erscheinen das An- und Abwesen des Anwesenden jeglicher Art und Stufe [presence still magnetizes presence/absence: self-showing marks the appearance of every kind/rank of presence/absence of all that is present] > even when man accomplishes showing, showing preceded by an indiction that it can be shown [beyond human] > must think of human saying like this to give adequate definition des Wesenden in all speaking

HDG.WL.content: way: to bring way forth, to be the way > Ereignis appropriates man to its own usage (Brauch) > Ereignis is the way-making for Saying to come into language > way-making (Be-wëgung) puts essence of language as language (Sage) into language > the way to language has transformed along the way [when we attend], via human activity, shifted to appropriating nature of language > only appears as a shift (Verlagerung) to us, w/ re: to ourselves > [Heidegger adds Gelassenheit as term to describe us listening freely to this appropriating nature of language]

HDG.EC.content: Nietzsche interpreted morality, the Platonic-Christian ethical doctrine, & its later secularized forms (rational Ethics of Enlightenment/socialism), as appearances (Erscheinungen) of will to power > Nietzsche didn’t realize that a will to power “beyond good & evil,” as realm of pure will to power, remains only counter-world (Gegenwelt) to Platonism > Nietzsche’s doctrine of “discipline and breeding (Zucht und Züchtung)” is extreme affirmation of morality > if will is evil, will to power is least of all beyond evil

HDG.EC.content: death itself: something that waits in us > death waits upon our waiting > may we even ask what we wait for if we are properly waiting? [beyond Being] > when we wait upon something: Erwarten, in awaiting pure waiting is disturbed > pure waiting: wait upon nothing > but if we specifically wait upon Nothing, we are awaiting again > pure waiting: to wait on that which corresponds (entspricht) to pure waiting, better yet, that which answers (antwortet) pure waiting

HDG.OHF.content: [Heidegger on modern forms of ontology vis phenomenology] only through phenomenology that ontology corresponding to it established on secure basis (sichere Problembasis): only in this manner that the consciousness-of-, the “of which (Wovon),” the object character of a being (der Gegenstandscharakter des Seienden) as such, becomes visible (sichtbar) > wide sense of phenomenology includes ontology > but, in such ontology, meaning of being (Seinssinn) never posed, unknown to it, genesis of meaning remains closed off to it > which field of Being is never asked

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger rails against those who “understand” only re: historical influences: nothing is expected of them, they care (sorgen) only about the pseudo (Pseudos)

HDG.OHF.content: all talking about hermeneutics misunderstands it, the wakefulness for facticity must temporalize/unfold “there” > hermeneutics [Heidegger admits to making a personal statement] not philosophy at all, something preliminary (Vorläufiges), has its own explanation (Bewandtnis) for being: what’s at issue in it, not to be finished quickly, rather to hold out in it as long as possible (möglichste lange darin auszuhalten) [slow down] > we’ve become so weak-kneed, pithless, can’t hold out in asking a qustion

HDG.OHF.content: [phenomenology beyond dialectic] dialectic directionless (richtungslos) when no Grundblick in direction of (auf) the subject matter (Sache), a rationality testing/proving itself by looking this way (i.e. not dialectically) [Heidegger uses rationality affirmatively here?] > all dialectic lives from table of others, Hegel: “this traditional material” (Plato, Aristotle) “extremely importance source, indeed a necessary condition [and] presupposition to be gratefully acknowledged” (Science of Logic) > dialectic is double-sidedly un-radical: 1) lives from hand to mouth 2) eloquent about readymade material

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: attention (aufmerksam) should’ve been called to certain difficulty: many directions of philosophy today don’t provide much basis for phenomenological analysis Heidegger is initiating here

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger believes it is best [why?] to treat everything said in today’s philosophy as pure/incontrovertible truth, not interested in truth/falsity of proposition but what goes on in this philosophy before it becomes what it is (was in dieser Philosophie vor sich geht) [hermeneutics as prior to philosophy] > methodology/logic couldn’t produce proper explanation because it would be a theory in same sense as this philosophy itself > Heidegger’s analysis will reactivate (nachvollziehen) step by step the context of its actualization (Vollzugszusammenhang) [cf. Derrida], bringing into relief how the object stands in view, how it is questioned, looked at, how concepts are being drawn (geschöpft) from it: ein Anspruch ganz primitiver Art (a quite primitive kind of claim/demand): can’t supply a basis (Boden) for this analysis

HDG.OHF.linkedContent: being everywhere & nowhere of philosophical knowing: an absolute curiosity (Neugier) [Heidegger then describes something close to idle talk, how philosophy is public, has an autonomous curiosity, gives itself a foothold in life, thus preserving itself]

HDG.OHF.content: [method: Heidegger now tries to show what is there for Dasein in the 2 interpretative modes (philosophy, historical consciousness)] Dasein itself goes toward something, having itself objectively there for itself, bringing itself objectively into its there > historical consciousness & philosophy are modes of Dasein, paths held open (preserved in itself), paths of securing/making certain, paths of falling away > Dasein encounters itself free of standpoints in objective certainty: 1) historical consciousness, Dasein encounters wealth of objective being of its having-been (Gewesenseins) 2) philosophy, Dasein encounters immutability of its always-being-in-such-a-manner (Immersoseins) > both interpretations bring Dasein before its highest & pure present

HDG.OHF.content: [bracketing of phenomenology—deconstruction of Heidegger’s destruction?] Husserl’s phenomenology: “where are the objects about which logic speaks and how are they for it?” > Brentano characterized consciousness as intentionality, a concept that arose in Middle Ages, though it had narrower meaning then: volitional being-out-for-something and going-toward-it (das willentliche Aussein auf etwas) (orexis)
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: [bracketing of phenomenology—deconstruction of Heidegger’s destruction?] Husserl’s phenomenology: “where are the objects about which logic speaks and how are they for it?” > Brentano characterized consciousness as intentionality, a concept that arose in Middle Ages, though it had narrower meaning then: volitional being-out-for-something and going-toward-it (das willentliche Aussein auf etwas) (orexis)

HDG.OHF.content: to bring mathematics to play as model (Vorbildes) for all scientific disciplines is unphenomenological: meaning of rigor must be drawn from kind of object being questioned & mode of access appropriate to it (angemessenen Zugangsart) [Heidegger beyond Husserl]

HDG.OHF.content: Heidegger describes how transcendental idealism entered phenomenology [via Dilthey?] &, as a countermovement, traditional realism > no one asked whether epistemological questions are meaningless in phenomenology
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: Heidegger describes how transcendental idealism entered phenomenology [via Dilthey?] &, as a countermovement, traditional realism > no one asked whether epistemological questions are meaningless in phenomenology

HDG.OHF.content: [why phenomenology requires destruction] in any discipline, we’re face to face w/ how things stand at the moment [i.e. how the public world views them] > their showing-themselves (Sich-zeigen) can be so restricted/fixed (festgelegt) by tradition, the inauthenticity goes unnoticed, taken for authentic: one passes off a contingency (Zufälligkeit) as an in-itself, takes a covering up (Verdeckung) for Sache itself > need to get beyond position started from (Anfangsstellung) & arrive at grasp of subject matter free of covering up (zur verdeckungsfreien Sacherfassung zu kommen) > the tradition must be dismantled (abgebaut)

HDG.OHF.content: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: (formal indication) forehaving of Dasein = being-there of Dasein (factical life) is being in a world > the success of such a demonstration (Ausweisung) doesn’t say anything primordial about forehaving, is only a phenomenon of another forehaving lying further back (already at work in our descriptions) [infinite regress of forehaving, no arrival?] [but Heidegger stresses this being in a world only a formal indication, we must follow its indefiniteness to the right path of looking (rechte Blickbahn), by way of intuition?]

HDG.OHF.content: subject-object schema a constructivistic forehaving, almost ineradicable due to pertinacity (Hartnäckigkeit) of sedimented (verhärteten) tradition > Heidegger speaks of disastrous infiltration (Einbruch) [betrayal] of subject-object schema into phenomenological research
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: subject-object schema a constructivistic forehaving, almost ineradicable due to pertinacity (Hartnäckigkeit) of sedimented (verhärteten) tradition > Heidegger speaks of disastrous infiltration (Einbruch) [betrayal] of subject-object schema into phenomenological research

HDG.OHF.content: difficulty of untangling context of tightly woven categories, & demonstrating it in intuition, disappears if (always anew) we “hold to the task of appropriating (aneignet) the corresponding position of looking (entsprechenden Blickstand) at it and holding out in (durchält) this looking […] i.e., staying clear of a certain sedimented customary approach” [guard against (auf der Hut ist) slipping back into it unawares (unversehens)—is Heidegger always this vigilant? is attention given to destruction or to Being?]

HDG.OHF.content: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: something that is there for us in the being-there of everdayness has forfeited (eingebüsst) authentic character of its there, now lingers in indifference of something we can ascertain > this ascertainability (Festsellbarkeit): not its being, but possibility of its being-an-object > in contrast: disclosedness of what has significance shows the something there in How of its Dasein [Heidegger follows this w/ condensed summary, beginning w/ “From out of…”]

HDG.OHF.content: to understand phenomenal context of significance: must see that its disclosedness stands in respective kind of care that tarries for awhile at a particular time (die Erschlossenheit in der jeweiligen Sorge steht): der Verweisungszusammenhang selbst ist das Besorgte > context of references is the environs in the authentic sense (eigentlich Umhafte), caring as a going around (Umgehen), going-here-and-there [cf. TEXT in Derrida] > significance (ontologically defined): the with-which of dealings (Umgang) with which our being cares

HDG.OHF.content: character of being of care: absorbed (aufgeht) in its temporalization/actualization (Vollzug) > going about everyday dealings has character of carefreeness (Sorglosigkeit), world appears straightforward, self-evident, care is asleep: possibility remains that distress (Bedrängnis) will break forth in world > [Heidegger now racing to explain how curiosity (cura-curiositas!) doesn’t do away w/ self-evidence but reinforces it, thus care of curiosity covers itself up] > phenomenon of care, a fundamental phenomenon > (“I must break off here”)
